full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 213 of 262 1924 LC8Cmax7 Rodgers - cross 1 A. Correct. 2 Q. So those three flights we just looked at are the only flights in the 1990s where a passenger with Jane's true first name is listed on your flight log; isn't that correct? 3 A. Correct. 4 Q. And we'll look at one last flight, which is at page 81. 5 We'll look at the flight number 1480 on March 31st of 2001. Do you see that flight? 6 A. Yes. 7 Q. That is a flight from Santa Fe to Palm Beach; yes? 8 A. Correct. 9 Q. And the passengers listed there are JE, GM, AP, Virginia Roberts, and then Jane's true first and last name this time; correct? 10 A. Yes. 11 Q. And then Henry Drecky (ph.) and Marvin Minsky; correct? 12 A. Yes. 13 Q. We won't go over JE and GM. AP is Adam Perry Lang; isn't that right? 14 A. Yes. 15 Q. He was one of Epstein's chefs? 16 A. Correct. 17 Q. He was a chef at the time? 18 A. Yes. 19 Q. And Virginia Roberts, we discussed, is someone you recall SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00019075
